message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique product. The price I'm asking for this exceptional item is $1200000. Let me know your thoughts!

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate you bringing this opportunity to me. While your offer is interesting, I was thinking of a price point around $1000000. This would be a fair price for both of us. What are your thoughts on this?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer of $1000000 but I believe the value of this product warrants a higher price. How about we consider a new price of $1150000? I think this reflects the uniqueness and quality of the product. What do you think?
